thread.title: Himesh Reshammiya touched by five-year-old singer on TV show
thread.title_full: Himesh Reshammiya touched by five-year-old singer on TV show

title: Himesh Reshammiya touched by five-year-old singer on TV show
text: Kareena Kapoor all set to make her TV debut! Himesh Reshammiya touched by five-year-old singer on TV show Composer Himesh Reshammiya feels Jayash, a five-year-old contestant of popular singing reality show "Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Li'l Champs", has some divine powers. IANS | Updated: Feb 18, 2017, 09.04 PM IST Composer Himesh Reshammiya feels Jayash , a five-year-old contestant of popular singing reality show "Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Li 'l Champs", has some divine powers. Himesh appears as a judge on the Zee TV show alongside Javed Ali and Neha Kakkar . All the three judges got surprised by Jayash's talent when he sang " Channa mereya" on stage. "Jayash is not only a good singer, but has an innocent divine energy which surrounds him. He is entirely oblivious to it. Looking at him, no one will know that this bundle of immense talent is suffering from a rare condition where his heart is on the right hand side unlike others," Himesh said in a statement. "Despite this, his ethereal voice and purity of soul has the ability to touch everyone's heart," he added. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device. RELATED
